prison.name: Prison
prison.description: Why'd you do that? Look where that got you, stupid.

about.name: Fine details
about.description: We're a little in love with stupidity. We also needed a place to channel that stupidity, and also a playground to test our wits and writing skills. Thus Peezy - Noire was born.

1.name: Red Woman
1.description:
A knock on my door. The sound resounds through my office, before a woman in red throws it open. 'What a way to enter', I mumble.

She's pretty though, her eyes like emeralds and her body cut finer than a diamond. Her dress caresses her curves like shrink wrap. I wonder what she wants.

2.name: Crystal
2.description:
A galeforce wind blows the door wide with her brisk entrance. She shuts it quickly, the cold apparently not fazing her. She turned, and smiled at me cheekily.

'What do you need?' I ask sternly, diverting the mood.

She walks quickly toward me. 'You busy?' she asks.

about.name: Fine Details
Fine Details
about.description: We're just some dudes that wanted to make the dumbest game possible, while having the time of our life learning and writing witty banter. We aren't actually racist.
